H1.text: when was the last summer olympics in the usa. 2008

H3.text: when was the last summer olympics in the usa. 1996

A4.text: The 1996 Olympics are the most recent edition of the Summer Olympics to be held in the United States.

A5.text: The 1996 Olympics were the last Summer Olympics to be held in North America until 2028, when Los Angeles will host the games for the third time.
